nodes.title: Added SpringSource repository to plugin repositories so that the bundlor plugin can get picked up
spring-retry was failing to build due to a dependency on bundlor which wasn't in the given repositories
Allow primitive type for @Recover method parameter
GH-214: Retryable on JPA Repos with proxyTargetClass [DO NOT MERGE]
Let build fail for failing tests
Add generic check for function return type
fix issue (#205) null pointer exception when circuit break attribute is not setted (CircuitBreakerRetryPolicy)
Changing it to set the timer only when the circuit first goes open
Support @Recovery method that is not defined in interface
Allow recover by name in `Retryable` annotation.
Fix #126 clearer documentation, enforce maxInterval value, tests
Fix #126 clearer documentation, enforce maxInterval value
Allow composing `Retryable` annotation with other annotations
Fix recovering with inheritance on argument types
Expose the MethodInvocation in the MethodInvocationRetryCallback
Fixed a typo in a comment
Introduction of fluent API for RetryTemplate configuration
Multiple recovery methods creating an ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException. Fixed #145
align default delay in code to value in document
Memory leak when @Retryable is used on a @Scope("prototype") bean. #141
#141, Fix memory leak when using @Retryable with beans having scope prototype.
GH-89: Deprecate templated expression in favor of literal expression
Corrected building classified Concurrent Map for retryable Exceptions.
Locate matching @Recover based on the number of parameters
Find @Recover/CB on target class with JDK proxy
TreeSet not always correctly sorted for "Uncomparable" exceptions
Allow resetTimeout and openTimeout to be inject via properties
Enable custom RetryPolicy on Retryable and CircuitBreaker
Fixes #74 - If includes is empty and excludes is not, retry not excluded exceptions
Document @Retryable's additional runtime dependency and advice on how it's best resolved.
Fix the Backoff.java docs even more
Recover method with return parent class
Retry annotation detected on implementing class
Override retry listeners for each Retryable method
Info on how to define listeners with annotations
GH-56: Add Retry All Except... Option
Set RetryState Key to null if Necessary
Fixed incorrect package name in README
Allow to access method metadata in retry listener
Update to latest stable Spring 4.0.9 release.
GH-13: Fix `@EnableRetry` do not proxy all beans
AMQP-334 Support Unwrapping Exceptions for Retry
